text: ♪ The Ghost And Molly McGee ♪

Can you believe
Andrea cleaned up

the whole Bark Park
by herself?

And she started
the recycling program.
She recycled one paper cup.

Charity is not
a competition, Miss McGee.
Doing good is its own reward.

But that's--
that's what I've been saying!

Now onto
the charity competition!

We're raising money for
a much needed school marquee.
( cooing )

As the final event
for volunteer week

whoever sells
the most nougat bars
will get a big fancy trophy.

Sign up now for
the Tournament of Nougat!
We need a new marquee?

Then I'm going
to help us get it!

By selling more candy
than Andrea Davenport.
Vengeful charity.

- I'm so proud of you!
- Okay. Hold on.
Because it's not about revenge.

- Ah, sure it is.
- I just want to do good

- for the school.
- Sure you do.

And if that happens
to show Brighton

who the real do-gooder is,
then you know?

Then we got her!
Right by the nougat!

Molly, so great of you
to help, you cutie.

You'll sell nougat.
I'll sell more nougat.

We'll earn enough
for that marquee in no time.
Maybe the best do-gooder win.

♪ I'm giving my all
to win this ♪
♪ Na na na, na na ♪

♪ I won't let no one
steal the show ♪

- ♪ Na na na, na na ♪ 
- ( dog whimpering )

♪ I'm working myself
senseless ♪
♪ Na na na, na na ♪

♪ While you're just over there
painting your toes ♪
♪ Na na na, na na ♪

♪ You look good
for the camera ♪

♪ But that won't stop me
from working hard ♪

♪ I'm gonna show the world
just what I'm made of ♪

♪ You may standing
in the spotlight ♪
♪ But I'm working hard ♪

♪ It's only a matter of time
till I break through ♪
♪ And they'll see that you ♪
♪ You're hardly working ♪
♪ You're hardly working ♪
♪ You're not doing anything! ♪
♪ You're hardly working ♪

I worked twice as hard
and cared nine times as much.

I'm going to win that award.
There's no way I don't.
We are going to crush Andrea.

- For charity, of course.
- Yeah. Charity.
The winner of volunteer week's
Tournament of Nougat is...

I'm kidding! You know who it is.
Andrea Davenport!

- What?
- ( laughs )
Hard work truly does pay off.
